website_summaries.verdict: With herculean battery life and a surprisingly high-quality display, the Blu Studio Energy is a solid affordable option on the unlocked Android smartphone market.
pros: Incredible battery life and reverse charging capability

customer_reviews.title: no upgrade to lollipop even though advertised as upgradeable (AUGUST 16, 2015)
customer_reviews.text: The phone works so far very well. The issue I have is with the camera which is lousy overall. It does what it says. However they advertise this phone to be upgradeable to lollipop and we are July 31 and no upgrade. I call that false advertising from either Blu or Amazon and this is not correct. I would have waited to buy this phone. There is now a new version of this phone with lollipop. Poor business practice. Update: Still no update to lollipop and when call placed to Blu, they stated no update to lollipop. Amazon, change the description of this phone. NO LOLLIPOP UPGRADE.
customer_reviews.author: Gatesbuster

customer_reviews.title: The case for it is very nice. Processor isn't super-fast
customer_reviews.text: Owned for one day - so far I'm impressed. The only issue I had was that the screen protector wouldn't fit right for the same reasons others gave. The case for it is very nice. Processor isn't super-fast, but that's offset somewhat by the fact that this thing isn't bogged down with bloatware. My AT&T Sim card works great in it and I think the phone is actually faster than the HTC One+ it replaced with all the same Apps. I had no issues running Waze and streaming a podcast using bluetooth on my way to work. 2 days without a charge is probably more realistic for a heavy user...that's still great battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Tons of internal software problems
customer_reviews.text: To be fair, this phone had a great spec sheet for the price and that's why I bought it, as a gift for someone. But that's where the good stops. Performance has been appalling. The phone frequently "runs out of storage" even when it shows almost zero apps installed. We have been through 3 different memory cards, several attempts to set up files to be written to the card and a hard reset on the recommendation of Blu service support. Finnally fed up of spending more time trying to fix the phone and very little time actually enjoying it. Getting a new phone tomorrow. No intention of going back to Blu again. Ever.
customer_reviews.author: Nayah N

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: After 3 month using my Blu Studio Energy, I can say that for me is the best cell phone that all ready had, the structure and material that is made of is great, screen quality and resolution i don't need more, camera pictures great, battery life great, a cell really made for working, definitely buy another, in fact I have 4 models of Blu cell phones and I don't change this brand, I have only one comment and I take it as a doubt when i bought the phone said it was not compatible with 4G, it was only 3G and now says in his caracteristics that is compatible with 4G HSPA +
customer_reviews.author: Juan Carlos

customer_reviews.title: For the Price I think its the best bang for the buck anywhere
customer_reviews.text: For the Price I think its the best bang for the buck anywhere. I do not understand why people compare it to "higher end" phones or expect it to be the mother ship of all phones its $150 people, you can go spend $800 or lock into a contract and be disappointed elsewhere. It is a good if not great phone IMO I don't have any complaints and after a few weeks of use the battery life usually lasts me 2-3 days easily. I check emails, play clash, Call text, browse the web,use Google maps, watch videos all with ease. Another thing to note is the screen doesn't feel cheap nor look "generic" like cheap phones Usually look.
customer_reviews.author: ray huerta

customer_reviews.title: Nice buy; good performance and battery backup
customer_reviews.text: Liked the phone and its capabilities. Pics and videos are nice. Excellent battery backup too. I use this as my backup GPS on my VFR flights and it sustains heavy GPS, maps usage for 3.5hrs of flight :) Good product for the price. Not a 5 star because: 1. power button placement is counter intuitive to the other smartphones that I have used and frequently keep taking snap shots. 2. back button placement is counter intuitive to the other smartphones that I have used
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Tons of energy
customer_reviews.text: Had this after an HTC M8, felt it kinda slow but i knew from the reviews but acceptable. Camara and internal memory ok for the price and insternal memory... just need a little more RAM memory I think Studio energy 2 will be much better with its 50% in RAM memory upgrade. I broke its screen and was 50!!!! So much for what it reallly is. PRO: BEFORE THIS BLU I HAD HTC M8 AND AFTER, I HAVE AN ASUS ZENPHONE 2, I MUST SAY MISS MY BLU BATTERY!!! CON: No G4 LTE, so if this is going to be used for a CARRIER with 4g lte, you gotta know it wont work.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Good phone, for the first year...
customer_reviews.text: This was a great phone. We had some issues with the GPS after one year of use. That was our only complaint. But that meant the GPS and navigation stopped working. We know that is was the phone as my 2 phones that are purchased at the same time both stopped working at the same time. We installed other apps, but they didn't work either.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie F.

customer_reviews.title: Experience with Blu Studio Energy
customer_reviews.text: This would have been a perfect phone, it charged very well, I was able to download all the applications that I wanted and was fast with the internet. All of a sudden the alarm clock first was not responding then it simply blacked out! Amazon has sent me a replacement, maybe it will prove better. Otherwise it is a beautiful phone, very well packaged and reached me on time. I pray this second one works well
customer_reviews.author: Apollo Gowa

customer_reviews.title: More for less. Get one!
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for a Lumina 900 Window phone. I've had this about a week and love it. Battery life is exceptional, runs smoothly once you get better apps on it (the stock ones work but there are better versions), it looks great and it has a case and screen protector INCLUDED. Update on battery life; charged it Friday, it is now Monday evening and I have 63% remaining battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Greentre

customer_reviews.title: Not a recommendable one. The display completely gone in ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a recommendable one. The display completely gone in 4 months. No help from the BLU Customer Support as well that too in a warranty period. They were not providing any solution, but just telling some unconvincing steps steps to reset the phone - which I cannot even see if the cell is switched ON of OFF. I haven't received any assistance from the customer care for my query till now. Please check further before you purchase this phone.
customer_reviews.author: sathya

customer_reviews.title: BLU Energy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome battery, lasted almost 5 days from a full charge. Got tired of recharging my Galaxy every 11 hours; would die usually when I need it. All phones should have this battery's duration time. The installed Apps were mostly the standard stuff no bloatware. Resolution is great, sound's good enough, pictures and video are decent enough and it's unlocked for use with any GSM company. Has 2 SIMs for traveling or business.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Segovia

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: The phone works great for the price point. Ive had this phone for 8 months and have one issue. Sometime it will not let me update apps, stating not enough memory. I have to unistall some apps or move them to the memory card. Other than that the phone is great. I wish the ram was higher than 1gb too.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice

customer_reviews.title: (At least) A Whole Week on a Single Charge
customer_reviews.text: This is a rocking phone! I was the last person on my block to get a smartphone, so I am glad I got this one. The super battery is really an extraordinarily useful feature -- I can go a whole week or more on a single charge. The screen size is good and the resolution is very high qualty. This phone is great.
customer_reviews.author: ABWO

customer_reviews.title: Battery life with both sims on is appalling
customer_reviews.text: I used it with two sims simultaneously, and found that the battery life last for one day only. I expected better performance with both sims. It lasts more than a day with only one sim in use. Cell standby uses a lot of battery. I don't know why. The sims I used were T-Mobile-based MVNOs. My phone was the global GSM version. I suggest they update the software to make use of Google's Android contacts app. This has a better Contacts Notes section than the current contacts app. My experience with this phone will make me stay away from Blu phones.
customer_reviews.author: D E

customer_reviews.title: ... phone to replace a larger BLU phone and absolutely love it. When its time to replace my husband's ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone to replace a larger BLU phone and absolutely love it. When its time to replace my husband's phone I will be going with a BLU. I like that this phone has a bigger battery and doesn't need charged as often as others.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndamae

customer_reviews.title: Buggy OS
customer_reviews.text: The phone itself is great and the battery life is excellent but the android OS that's installed is unacceptable. It starts out fine but once you install several apps and let them auto update it starts to boot loop. I don't know if it's apps that are downloaded or built in apps that update and cause the boot loop but I've exhausted all possibilities short of installing a custom rom which I shouldn't have to do if they'd update to lollipop like they say. So I returned this phone and bought the new energy 2 that was just released at $179.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and just overall a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This phone is laggy, glitchy, and just overall a waste of money. I had the lg g2 before this and I wish I just kept my old phone! This phones battery life lasts forever, but it doesn't make up for all the cons. Would not reccomend. Buy a name brand phone!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Dunning

customer_reviews.title: I liked it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I liked it a lot. Very bright screen and durable battery but, mine came and now it is not working properly, not because of BLU bad quality, it is due to android failures. I will have to re-install the system. Besides that, excellent phone.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Awesome battery, while it worked.
customer_reviews.text: Mine died after 13 months. ONE month past the warranty. Battery went from 100% at 6:00 AM, to dead by 8:00 AM, the same day. Now it wont charge. I should have known this was coming. Over the past couple of months the battery would drop from 25% to 0 in a matter of 15 minutes, but not every time. Seemed like the older it got, the more attitude it had. Now, I get to drop ANOTHER $150 on a phone.
customer_reviews.author: Mick Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Verry nice phone
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice phone. The calls are very clear on both ends, it feels great not like some phones I've had before. I don't consider myself a power user and the battery last me around two days of daily Google +, a lot of text and emails and web browsing.
customer_reviews.author: DSG

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap phone.
customer_reviews.text: I like phone, for the price you can't go wrong . Battery life is great heavy use it last day and a half normal used like 3days. I found out you can get a screenshot by pressing the volume down and power button at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: philipe contreras

customer_reviews.title: Big screen, big battery, and perfect for presbyopic neo-Luddites
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this phone. I myself am partial to the i-devices, but it's his phone and he loves it. With his last two phones, he would barely carry them. He would "misplace" them for weeks at a time. The fact that he actually carries and answers this phone makes it a 5-star product for me.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa L.

customer_reviews.title: A great phone
customer_reviews.text: Enjoying the phone. Unimpressed with the battery though it does last a little longer than usual. If I'd known the battery was not removable/replaceable I wouldn't have bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Karl E. O. Fraser

customer_reviews.title: This thing never runs out of power and with the ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing never runs out of power and with the ability to schedule on/off airplane mode and power it makes it that much easier.
customer_reviews.author: ØD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect BLU!!
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT CELL PHONE FOR ME.......BATTERY LAST A LONG TIME UNPLUGGED...... PICKS UP WLAN SIGNALS.....ITS FAST AND QUICK.......I BOUGHT A 64GB SD MICRO CARD FOR EXTRA MEMORY FOR MUSIC....I LOVE THIS PHONE......BUT I SUGGEST TO PUT PHONE ON PASSCODE LOCK OR YOULL BE GHOST DAILING STRANGERS HAHAH OVERALL I RATED THIS PHONE 10+++++
customer_reviews.author: ricky hammersley

customer_reviews.title: it more then he thought it would be and the battery life is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his phone thank you! it more then he thought it would be and the battery life is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: In the end it's a great phone.
customer_reviews.text: The cell phone meets all the requirements I was looking for in a phone. Long battery life is a major plus for me. A little on the heavy side compare to my last cell phone. In the end it's a great phone.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mckeown

customer_reviews.title: about the BATTERY
customer_reviews.text: Since the battery is the main concern of this phone it was not mention that its built in... im not using it yet just pick it up today from the post office , i will give an update soon

customer_reviews.title: Works good out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Works good out of the box. Its works even better and faster if you install a Launcher with some customizable themes. Battery life - 2 1/2 days with heavy use. Brightness adjusted to half or lower will give you about 5 days. It's a basic phone but worth the price. The only complain is the in-call volume, way too soft.
customer_reviews.author: Mr D

customer_reviews.title: Came exactly as described, 100% charged.
customer_reviews.text: Got it today exactly as described. Arrived at 100% battery. will update after I have some time with it. All I needed was a sim card. I used a straight talk sim card tailored for a T-mobile network. Since the phone uses HSPA+. I used the APN settings provided by straight talk. and the 4g came right in and everything seems to work. netflix works fine as well as my SNES emulator. Bloatware is non-existent asside from the general google stuff. My app drawer is two pages. with everything. Pretty awesome so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this phone..battery lasts for days without recharging...solid feel to phone, fast processing, just an overall great product
customer_reviews.author: RUBEN RODRIGUEZ

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice phone with good (well
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice phone with good (well, very good) battery life. Interface is a little sluggish, but hey, it is pretty nice for the price. And I am sure that no one who buys this expects a good camera. If you do, well, good luck.
customer_reviews.author: Brad S.

customer_reviews.title: would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: initially liked it. Blu not customer friendly no lollipop update . Lost my support. Buy from another company my advice- This company lacks common courtesy to respond to genuine customer questions. Update bought Nexus 6.
customer_reviews.author: mcelda

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT MAKE IT TO 1 YEAR
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT IT 2-24-16 THERE WAS AN UPDATE 2-11-16 AND AFTER ,NOW THE PHONE DOES NOT SEE THE SIMS! HAVE RESET IT STILL NOT WORKING ,CANT MAKE ANY CALLS. NOT AN UPDATE!
customer_reviews.author: Ernest A. Andujo

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life...really good picture quality
customer_reviews.text: For an upper middle Android phone you can't go wrong. Runs apps smoothly and video play back and sound is pretty sweet. Best of all it actually works as a phone too...no dropped calls and touch screen is easy to text with. Solid buy for $140.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This phone is worth the price,5000mah battery is second to none
customer_reviews.author: X11X

customer_reviews.title: Awsome phone
customer_reviews.text: I really love this phone it's battery life is amazing I don't have to charge it for 4 days. I love this phone I already bought a another one for my family u should defently buy it
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are of excellent quality, fast delivery, I recommend it 100%
customer_reviews.author: Jesús Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, loooong battery life
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, loooong battery life. I listen to music and use google maps all day and I can go 2 days without changing even with heavy use. The camera is not as sharp as an iPhone's but that dosent bother me too much. I would reccomend it for anyone looking for a reliable phone. I used to have an iPhone 5 and I don't miss it one bit.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Danielle Forsyth

customer_reviews.title: A great device, with insane battery life
customer_reviews.text: A great device, with insane battery life. BLUs skin is very close to stock android with a few tweaks. There is little lag with the Mediatek processor and 1gig of RAM. Would definitely recommend for anyone looking for a sub $150 device/
customer_reviews.author: Jack Moynihan

customer_reviews.title: It's as good as phone in that price range can be
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one for 135$. It's as good as phone in that price range can be. It has a good grip, and smooth feel. Very snappy as long as you use the basic apps, obviously you can't expect a remarkable performance from a 135$ handset. Battery life is great (as it should be). Overall I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Talavera

customer_reviews.title: Love the extra Energy!
customer_reviews.text: Great phone and great price! I love battery life. I never realized how nice it is not to have to charge my phone everyday. I never worry either about my phone alarm not going off cause of a dead battery. It's just always ready.
customer_reviews.author: Annie1984

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very workable little pre loaded apps but down load thru google play ok.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Foster

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone, i am a power user and is so comforting to spend your day knowing you battery wont run out. I just wish it have 1 gb more of ram, that is all, using it until its succesor comes out.
customer_reviews.author: E. Khater

customer_reviews.title: This phone is a great help to me
customer_reviews.text: This phone is a great help to me. It is my portable office and mini-computer. I am currently in Tanzania and it works well. My family has 2 of them and there are other ones here too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: absolutely love the battery life on this phone
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love the battery life on this phone! works as directed and haven't had any problems after about a year
customer_reviews.author: Awilby

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is great! It does everything I need my phone to ...
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is great ! It does everything I need my phone to do. It doesn't look or feel cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Alarick Parkey

customer_reviews.title: ¡¡ Excellent phone !!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone, the battery life is excellent, by sending amazon was fast, they were very efficient. It can operate in Venezuela with all operators. Actually I was very pleased with this brand of phone. Thank you very much for everything, greetings !!
customer_reviews.author: wuillians noguera

customer_reviews.title: Great smart phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good android phone with excellent battery life! Can't compete with the likes of Galaxy S or iPhone in performance and display, but it's a very good unlocked smart phone for the price. Can go 2-4 days without a charge!
customer_reviews.author: TARIQ Sadiq

customer_reviews.title: OK for the money
customer_reviews.text: Customizing features suddenly stopped working. Required hard reset to clear. Dropped calls and rebooted too often to tolerate. Great battery life. Easy to set-up. Probably a decent phone for the money if I could tolerate the unexpected rebooting.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie Kerr

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is out of this world!!! Spent most of the day setting up,gaming, Facebook,and the web. 12 + hrs and had 23% battery left at the end of the day... I love Blu products... My kids like my over their Galaxy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have received the package in poor condition. did not bring accesorires
customer_reviews.text: I have received the package in poor condition. did not bring accesorires, the frame is broken and the battery can not be charged because it makes a faulty connection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my personal instrument of communication!..........I don't have to charge for a full week!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Fedee

customer_reviews.title: Battery works great and is what i was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Battery works great and is what i was looking for . It's the Android version what I don't like it
customer_reviews.author: Federico Matias Mazzieri

customer_reviews.title: Well there has been no lollipop update like was promised
customer_reviews.text: Well there has been no lollipop update like was promised. This was supposed to happen months ago. There are unoffical ROMs out there which could easily ported to an ota update but blu won't be bothered. There is no explation or response to me or many others asking about this.
customer_reviews.author: benjamin palumbo

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is the best that I never know
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is the best that I never know. I hope more storage in next version. I will buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Webrev.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price ,I just install the chip and immediately read it,no need of any software modification, works right,and very capable as the most expensive phones
customer_reviews.author: ARMANDO

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Phone refuses to turn on after 4 months of regular use.
customer_reviews.author: no

customer_reviews.title: Love the phone
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone, good size. Only thing is as a teenager, who uses there phone 24/7. It only last me all day, not for 4 days as many people say. Still amazing, my old moto g only lasted 2 hours max.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight Henderson

customer_reviews.title: David
customer_reviews.text: is spectacular, the battery lasts me about three days ... it's pretty smart, nothing to envy to other phones. I recommend it 100%

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the phone is broken and i cant return. i need my money back.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: GPS does not work, and the phone turn off by it self if you work heavily.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: For $150 it's not a bad phone. I get two days battery life on heavy usage which is amazing. It does have a slight lag but I wasn't expecting much from an off brand product.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M.

customer_reviews.title: Super smartphone for its price
customer_reviews.text: Super smartphone for its price! Great screen, big battery, fast work. GPS works fine. One minus: if turn on WiFi it started loosing charge suspected fast. Others 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Dmitrii

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for the price .. The battery is one of the best among other smartphone FYI I can go through 2 days without charging the phone
customer_reviews.author: Abel Benitez

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone however it does take a long yimr ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone however it does take a long time to charge the battery.. I also do not like that the home buttons do not light up..

customer_reviews.title: I am very glad.
customer_reviews.text: Battery working week without recharging . stunned and did not get up. I am very glad.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: For $150 I am very happy so far. There are some issues with lag but again $150.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with BLU Studio Energy Cell Phone. Definitely suggest to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: R Shah

customer_reviews.title: It does the job well. Thats what i am ...
customer_reviews.text: It does the job well. Thats what i am using right now. As long as u dont expect and iphone6 killer.

customer_reviews.title: 5000mah monster
customer_reviews.text: Powerfull device good quality works in saudi Arabia network very smoothly

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good phone, but I don't like the second sim card. I would recommend

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!! LOVE THIS PHONE!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS PHONE!!!!! its so AWESOME!!! i recomend it to everyone!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Phone for the low price I paid. The battery is amazing :)
customer_reviews.author: julio

customer_reviews.title: If you buy this phone, then you have to ...
customer_reviews.text: If you buy this phone, then you have to live with many compromises.It works, but you need to struggle with many issues and many applications do not work.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Mezhibovsky

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. Great smartphone. Only four stars because default apps such as keyboard and SMS are locked. Not as snappy as more expensive phones, but more than adequate for just about everything ( web browsing, email, Netflix, hangouts.) Big screen is easy to see and very readable. The battery life is as advertised. Amazing. You could talk for an entire day.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Good apearenc, good service
customer_reviews.text: I have no enough time to work with the phone. Good apearenc, good service. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: zbigniew las

customer_reviews.title: not bad
customer_reviews.text: It is ATT and while the phone is nice it took three weeks to get it up and running. I realize some of the issues are because I'm on ATT lines but the correction of voice to text is glichy.
customer_reviews.author: Lona

customer_reviews.title: worst phone i ever owned
customer_reviews.text: There or some older phone are just better than this energy. The only good thing about is -battery -built quality -speakers Everything else is trash, picture quality is decent but take a long time just to pop on gallery , and when deleting picture after taking a picture takes for ever! A lot of glitchy and lagg. If it was 2 gig of ram it be cool, but this phone is just a rebranded. Not lime blu made it. What a joke
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Phao

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cell phone
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cell phone!! its a good phone with a very nice batery.. a used for 3 day without problems!! very recommend if you want a phone with long batery
customer_reviews.author: julio martinez

customer_reviews.title: I was so happy to receive this phone
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to receive this phone, the only cons is that I have problem to connect my car by Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great phone but have lot to figure out on your own
customer_reviews.author: Dan S.

customer_reviews.title: Without a sim in the unit the return, home ...
customer_reviews.text: Without a sim in the unit the return , home and box list indicators do not light up. Called Blu they stated the indicators were not to light in this model?.! Trying to verify this...
customer_reviews.author: Stanley James

customer_reviews.title: Super battery!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about the accuracy of the claims but the battery power is awesome! And it even comes with some great features not mentioned that are similar to the Galaxies. Everything so far has been beyond expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: it is great. Unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: Aesthetically speaking, it is great. Unfortunately, if you have At&T, it only works with postpaid plans. There are no prepaid plans through AT&T that works with this phone. That being said, I had to return because I am not changing carriers for one phone. In the description, if it had read only postpaid plans worked, I would not have bought this phone. Amazon is graciously refunding my account.
customer_reviews.author: Sapphire Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Feeling Blu about my new phone 😢
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone for a week and the only good thing about it is the battery life. Thing that should be simple to do are impossible to do, like moving a picture to the folder of my choice or creating folders and making setting changes and having to redo them every time u turn the phone on. I had a blu dash 5.0 that I loved but I dropped it and the screen cracked so I had to get a new phone. I like the Blu phone but the studio energy is not for me. I hope I can return it for another Blu phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kina

customer_reviews.title: don't purchase
customer_reviews.text: This phone deserves a GONG!!! What a joke. Seriously is nothing like its description. 8megapixel camera is more like a 0 megapixel. Horrible photos. Verrrry sloooow processor. Two thumbs down! If I could give half star I would!
customer_reviews.author: cynthia walker

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone for the price. Some issues moving apps to 64GB micro SD card.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing phone for $150. We now have 3 in our family, but we were unable to move any apps to the 64GB micro SD cards that we purchased with the phones. Turns out that the phone (currently) struggles with available free space of over 32GB. I've posted a writeup on a workaround here:  Had this phone been available last summer, I would have preferred it over the Samsung S5 that I ended up buying. The Blu Studio Energy is a little slower and has less memory, but for the price you just can't beat it. One final tip, install Google Launcher and Google Keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Brian E.

customer_reviews.title: A Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Great battery life. On full charge after 2.5 days of slight use it shows 90% of battery available. Dual active SIMS is really nice. Software allows you to turn individual SIMS off. Bright screen. CONS: Unlike my other Android 4.x devices, this one has no "Data Use" monitoring...BIG drawback if you are on a limited data plan. Limited on-phone storage. Screen response is a bit slow and glitchy compared to say an HTC One (M8). Overall, for $150 unlocked, it's a good deal for someone who wants a dual SIM phone and long battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Cellphone User

customer_reviews.title: Out ot memory .. every single one
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased and used 3 Blu phones. They all run out of phone memory even thought there is ample extra microsd space available. onc either runs out there is nothing you can do to fix this problem. You have to factory reset it and lose all your stuff. On a weekly basis. DO NOT GET BLU phones .. they are not working !!!
customer_reviews.author: Webspinman

customer_reviews.title: No lollipop update happening...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this thinking I could upgrade it to lollipop in July, when BLU said the update would be out. It's the end of September and there is still no Lollipop update and it looks like BLU has scrapped the upgrade. Phone is very laggy but the battery does last a long time. Good for a backup phone, that's it.
customer_reviews.author: teebee

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Phone, Exceptional Price
customer_reviews.text: They said that the phone could last for 4 days of standard use. But for the way I use it, it only last 2 days. But that is okay since this is a great product. Just keep in mind that the user interface is choppy due to the 1 GB of RAM. But if battery life is you're most important feature in a phone that you use for only doing regular stuff such as Facebook and playing games with low graphics, then this is the best phone. I chose this phone over the Moto G 2014, because it has the Super Battery along with freebies that make you save money on cases and headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Kowshik Noor

customer_reviews.title: great phone for 3 years
customer_reviews.text: I miss this phone, work well for three years and suddenly the screen went blank. A technician told me that it is the connector that goes from the screen to the plate. If I got that piece, I could save that phone. Does anyone know if you can get blu phone parts?
customer_reviews.author: Raul Lopez Diaz

customer_reviews.title: it's all about the battery
customer_reviews.text: In some ways, a step down from my Nexus 5. But it delivers on the one critical issue that sold me; long battery life! Nothing else I've used comes close. Switching from Dalvik to Art runtime smoothed some things out, as well as using Nova Launcher instead of Google Now. I don't know if my next phone will be made by BLU, but for the price I paid? I'd definitely consider it! (three months later) Still using it. Still charging it every other day! Nice.
customer_reviews.author: merely_jim

customer_reviews.title: More than pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone for my mother. Her number one desire is a smart phone that will last as long as a flip phone. This has definitely fit the bill. The specs are amazing at this price point and the performance is as well just amazing. There isn't a single time that I talk to her and she doesn't mention how much she loves this thing and what this phone can do. I really am hoping these guys turn the industry on its ear and years from now they are the true innovators in the mobile market. Keep up the good work and godspeed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't have to plug it in every night, and isn't that wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Battery, I get about three days, blows away any other contemporary phone. Cheap. $150 is just amazing. Close-to-stock Android. Will take a 64gb micro SD card CONS: High ambient Ram usage. Camera is Meh. Not as "snappy" as an ios device. Has very weird issues with properly switching sources when using the aux jack.
customer_reviews.author: Windham M. Graves

customer_reviews.title: For those of us that hate having a phone die on them then this is ...
customer_reviews.text: The don't lie about the battery in this phone. For those of us that hate having a phone die on them then this is a phone for you. It will last several days easily. I don't use my phone very much but I have had it last all weekend. Thursday night through Monday night without charging and still had 36%. People that use their phones more might notice a shorter battery life but it will still be long. Performance can be kind of lacking at times but I would trade battery life and affordability for some performance any day of the week. Great phone.
customer_reviews.author: N. Connors

customer_reviews.title: Only two irritations.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfully good value on a smartphone. Dual sim cards means I don't have to carry two phones (personal and work). One down check is the Bluetooth. Two down checks. It will sync to a headset or hands free but doesn't recognize control buttons on a headset. The email client needs to have an option for "select all" instead of prairie dogging the individual select marks.
customer_reviews.author: Steven C. Jerkins

customer_reviews.title: Memory card working
customer_reviews.text: Alot of people have said they can't get the phone to recognize their memory card. Or that you need to load approximately 32GB of data on it before it will recognize it. My suggestion is that you make sure the memory card is formatted first before using it in the phone and then the phone should recognize it with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

product_meta.title: BLU Studio Energy - With 5000 mAH Super Battery - Global GSM- Unlocked Cell Phones (Black)
product_meta.description: The Studio Energy is not just packed with beautiful hardware on the inside, it also has a premium build that is evident upon first look. Say goodbye to the anxiety of looking at your battery indicator. The industry leading Studio Energy packs a 5000 mAh battery which can last up to 96 hours with standard usage or 45 days stand by time. Also reverses charges to serve as a power bank. Enjoy it all from the 5.0" HD screen with 720 x 1280 resolution covered by a protective layer of Corning Gorilla Glass 3 to make sure your screen is protected from all of life's hazards. This premium device is powered by a 1.3GHz Quad Core Processor and 1GB of RAM. The main shooter is an 8MP Main Camera and 2MP on the front for selfies.
feature_bullets: 5,000mAh Super Battery: Go Up to 4 Days on Standard Usage with a Single Charge, or 45 days stand-by.
5.0" HD IPS Display (300ppi), 8MP Main Camera + 2MP Front Camera, MediaTek Quad Core 1.3GHz Processor with ARM Mali-400 GPU
Unlocked Dual Sim Phone, Android 4.4 Kit Kat upgradeable to Android 5.0 Lollipop, 8GB Internal Storage 1GB RAM with Micro SD Slot up to 64GB
GSM Quad Band 4G HSPA+ (850/1900/2100): US Compatibiliy: AT&T, T-Mobile, Cricket, MetroPCS, and others, including most 3G UMTS/HSPA+ Networks when roaming outside the US
Includes Headphones, Screen Protector, Protective case, and USB OTG Cable to work as a Portable Power Bank and Charge Other Devices on the Go

Unlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T and T-Mobile as well as with GSM SIM cards (e.g. H20, Straight Talk, and select prepaid carriers). Unlocked cell phones will not work with CDMA Carriers like Sprint, Verizon, Boost or Virgin.

8 GB Storage Capacity (Estimated Free Space 6 GB)
